glossdef.p: A component is a group of one or more artifacts.
A component can be regarded as logical aggregate. License information is assigned at the component level and is consistent within aggregated artifacts.
A hardware component groups devices or parts.

In common usage, the term component has a different connotation. In the context of software design or software architecture, the term "component" is understood as a self-contained building block that is integrated into a system. In an actual implementation, however, a system-specific manifestation or a component is used only in parts. Therefore, the term "component" is used here only to group the actual constituents (artifacts).
